traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (Sd8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
